[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@3rdweb/sdk](./sdk.md) &gt; [VoteContract](./sdk.votecontract.md)

## VoteContract class

Create a decentralized organization for token holders to vote on proposals.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class VoteContract implements UpdateableNetwork 
```
<b>Implements:</b> UpdateableNetwork

## Example


```javascript
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@3rdweb/sdk";

// You can switch out this provider with any wallet or provider setup you like.
const provider = ethers.Wallet.createRandom();
const sdk = new ThirdwebSDK(provider);
const contract = sdk.getVoteContract("{{contract_address}}");
```
